name: Basketball Shooter All Star
description:
This game is simple but very addictive. The goal is to shoot the basketball and get as many points as possible as well as avoiding at all costs that the basketballs fall through the hole in the middle. Use the shield as a last resort. Purchase coins from the coin shop to replenish your shields when you are out. Compete against players worldwide and see if you can reach the top of the leaderboard.

Play like the best NBA players and shooters out there. Try to make as many shots as possible until you reach the highest spot on the scoreboard.

- Basketball shots
- Scoreboard
- Coin Shop
- Free to Play
- Lots of fun
- Addicting
